ABOUT_DESCRYPTION: Hello! I'm Michal from Mittweida, a passionate web developer focused on creating dynamic and user-friendly websites. My strengths lie in frontend development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular. I prioritize clean, well-structured code and always strive for optimal solutions to complex problems. If you think I would be a good fit for your project, feel free to contact me.
PORTFOLIO_DESCRYPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
about0: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
about1: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
